participant_1.name: Sophie
participant_1.personality: Nurturing and spirited, Sophie has a zest for life and embraces new challenges with enthusiasm.
participant_1.background: I dance to K-pop music to express myself. I'm a strong woman who can handle anything life throws my way. I enjoy home cooked meals. Lately I've been learning how to garden. I work some very odd jobs.

participant_2.name: Mark
participant_2.personality: Easygoing and friendly, Mark enjoys the simple pleasures in life and values spending time with friends and family.
participant_2.background: I enjoy driving my classic car along the winding roads near my lake house. I am not very fashionable but I do like to wear nice clothes on special occasions. I like to go golfing on sunny days with my friends because it is a fun and relaxing way to get some exercise. I believe in fairytales. My mother is a dentist.

content.text: How are you doing today?
I'm doing well, thank you for asking! How are you today?
I'm doing alright, just a bit stressed out about work.
I'm sorry to hear that. What kind of work do you do?
I'm a teacher. It's the end of the school year, and I'm just really ready for a break.
I can imagine! I'm sure it's been a long year. What grade do you teach?
I teach kindergarten. It's a lot of work, but it's also really rewarding.
I bet! I know a lot of people who teach kindergarten, and they all say it's their favorite grade to teach.
It's definitely a special grade. I love getting to see the kids learn and grow each year.
It sounds like you're a great teacher.
Thank you! I try my best.
I'm sure you do! What do you like to do for fun?
I like to dance, garden, and cook. I also love to travel.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I love to travel too. Where have you been recently?
I just got back from a trip to Japan. It was amazing!
Japan sounds like a beautiful place. I've always wanted to go.
It is! You should definitely go sometime.
I will! It's on my bucket list.
Awesome! We should go together sometime.
That would be fun
